name: Avoid undocumented Methods or Functions (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all undocumented Methods and Functions.
output:
This report lists all undocumented Methods and Functions.

This QR provides the following information:
Method or Function full name.
rationale: Code maintainability is improved if code has comments.This rule reports whether methods and function has comments.
remediation: Modify the source code to reduce the number of undocumented Methods and Functions.
remediationSample:
<?php
class CastTest {
    function addItem($num1,$num2) {
        // Add items
        $num1 += $num2;
	    echo $num1;
    }
}
$obj = new CastTest();
$obj-> addItem(2,3);
?>
